Text: REshame on me I did try to email you Glad things are going good for you Smart move with the girlfriend you both need your own space Im busy as ever Cant remember if I told you Im the CAD Manager now I like it okay its just hard to juggle those fulltime responsibilities and go to school three nights a week too Only weeks left though and Im finished until fall I wish I was finished for good but that will take a few years It was good to hear from you Keep in touch when are coming to town Take care Melissa Original Message From mailto Sent Friday April PM To Subject Melissa I have changed jobs I now work for Enron My new email address is I left my old job on March so if youve tried to get a hold of me thats why I havent responded If you havent tried to get a hold of me then shame on you Anyway things seem to be going good My girlfriend is graduating in May and moving to Houston to start her new job at Conoco No we will not be living together We figured we ought to ease into things since we havent lived in the same city for awhile Besides she needs to be out on her own for a little while Remember that car I had when you last saw me at Amys wedding well I was able to pay it off the other day Im feeling pretty cool now Thats about it from here Clint
